title: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (June 13 - July 19) will also receive:
- The new Maibatsu MonstroCiti
- The Avenger Operations Terminal
- Hinterland Track Shorts and T-Shirt
- Chameleon Wheel Paints
- 1.5X Rewards on Project Overthrow and Hangar Sell Missions
- And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
